text: Pim de Kuijer Wilhelm Leonard (August 13, 1981 â€“ July 17, 2014) was a Dutch columnist and lobbyist. He worked as a lobbyist for the organization STOP AIDS NOW!.Pim de Kuijer, my friend and Aids campaigner, killed in MH17 crash, The Guardian, July 18, 2014 Kuijer was with dozens of others on their way to an international AIDS conference in Melbourne, when the plane he was on Malaysia Airlines Flight 17 over Ukraine was shot down, aged 31.In memoriam Pim de Kuijer D66.com, July 18, 2014 ==References== Category:1981 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Aviation deaths Category:Dutch columnists Category:Dutch lobbyists Category:Dutch writers Category:HIV/AIDS activists Category:Malaysia Airlines Flight 17 Category:Medical researchers Category:Dutch murder victims
title: Pim de Kuijer
